body: Its a common knowledge that this site does not translate any of this hentai manga. They just take it from all over the internet and post it here.

" if you ask translatons, you will die "

These words are too harsh , it even makes me lose interest to comment in every single post here,, i believe most visitors feel the same way,
Moderator dont kill your own website,,  web is supposed to be easy,simple, and user-friendly, im saying this for good sake.
